sn52.7:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma anuruddho bhikkhu amantesi:
sn52.7:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anuruddhassa paccassosum.
sn52.7:2.1: “Cattarome, avuso, satipatthana bhavita bahulikata tanhakkhayaya samvattanti.
sn52.7:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.7:2.7: ime kho, avuso, cattaro satipatthana bhavita bahulikata tanhakkhayaya samvattanti”ti.
